reviewText: This was not a strong installation in this informative and user-friendly series.  It was great to see that for which doctors are searching in colorectal exams.  Also, the work speaks of the stages of the cancer and why individuals should be checked early so as to fight the illness most effectively.  They then show men and women of various ages who have been affected by the disease.  Still, it just didn't say much.  I thought more could have been done in this program.
